name: One Piece: World Chronicles
description: A One Piece-themed choose-your-own-adventure game. You are a rookie setting sail on the vast oceans, a world of pirates, marines, and incredible Devil Fruits. Your choices will determine your destiny: will you seek the ultimate freedom and become the Pirate King, enforce the World Government's absolute justice, or walk a path entirely your own? Earn a legendary bounty, form a powerful crew, and watch as the world reacts to your growing legend.
